days.title: Make.com setup: your command center
days.warmup: Open Make.com, click 'Create a new scenario'

days.title: Gmail → Drive (watch)
days.warmup: Rename the scenario.

days.title: Gmail → Drive (act)
actions: Add Google Drive module 'Upload a file'
Send yourself a test email with attachment
days.warmup: Send a test email.

days.title: Filter practice
actions: Add a Filter: only if sender includes 'amazon.com'
days.warmup: Add a label to your Gmail test message.

days.title: Twitter/X → Google Sheets (watch)
days.warmup: Create the target Google Sheet.

days.title: Twitter/X → Google Sheets (act)
actions: Add Google Sheets module 'Add a Row'
Activate it and post a tweet
days.warmup: Add a new column 'URL' to the sheet.

days.title: Extend to another network
days.warmup: Color one completed row green.

days.title: Smart Notifier — router
actions: Create a Google Sheet with 'Task' and 'Priority'
days.warmup: Make two dummy rows.

days.title: Urgent → Push
actions: If Priority == URGENT → send push via Make mobile app
days.warmup: Install Make mobile app.

days.title: Normal → Email
days.warmup: Write one URGENT and one NORMAL task.

days.title: Edge cases & testing
days.warmup: Add data validation to the sheet.

days.title: Public API — OpenWeather
days.warmup: Copy your API key to a safe note.

days.title: HTTP module call
actions: Use Make 'HTTP' module to GET current weather for your city
days.warmup: Add ?units=metric to your request.

days.title: Rain filter + schedule
days.warmup: Run once manually.
